NAEB RADIO NETWORK
31
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title; THE SEARCH FOR TRUTH & UNITY
Type; Lecture
Time; 55;00
No*; 4 to conclude series
Origin; Cooper Union-WNYC
Audience; Adult
Serial Number; 57-15
Release Date; Issue 14 (April 7)
The following four lectures will conclude this series;
Program 7 - Issue 14
’’The Age of Enlightenment” - Henry Neumann, Leader, Brooklyn Society for Ethical
Culture.
Program 8 - Issue 15
’’Contemporary European Philosophy” - Charles W. Hendel, Clark Professor of Moral
Philosophy and Metaphysics5 Chairman, Department of Philosophy, Yale University.
Program 9 - Issue 16
’’Existentialism” - Marc Slonim, author and critic; faculty member, Sarah Lawrence
College.
Program 10 - Issue 17
’’The Achievement and Promise of American Philosophy” - Horace M. Fallen, Research
Professor in Social Philosophy, New School for Social Research.
